message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. Given its unique value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000. I'm confident this is a fair reflection of its worth.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I'm not sure I can meet your initial price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1,200,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position.  While that's lower than I'd hoped, I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional value.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make a counteroffer of $1,300,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
